document_data.name: Achen Dell
document_data.mainbody: '''Achen Dell''' was a mercenary who lived in the Realms during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He took on jobs that he believed would include fighting against forces of evil.
document_data.Possessions: Achen owned an ''[[item enchantment|enchanted]] +1 [[longbow]]'', a weapon he wielded with exceptional skill.
document_data.Relationships: Archel Dell had a family that he cared for greatly.
document_data.History:
At some point, Achen joined an adventuring group led by the [[elf]] known as [[Vail]]. The group assaulted the [[wizard]] [[Ramazith Flamesinger]] at [[Ramazith's tower|tower]] in the [[Baldur's Gate/Temples District|Temples District]] of [[Baldur's Gate]]. He and his comrades were ''[[petrified]]'' by the gaze of a [[basilisk]].

The stone forms of the adventurers were then sold as works of art to the Baldurian nobleman, [[Felonius Gist]], and kept at [[Gist|his family's]] estate in the city.
